entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High zero.
